name: Wan 2.2
purpose: Open-source AI video generation from text prompts or images
description: Wan 2.2 is an open-source AI video generation model released under Apache 2.0 license. It supports text-to-video and image-to-video generation with advanced features including lighting control, camera angle adjustments, time-of-day variations, and saturation control. Available in three model types: 14B parameter Mixture of Experts (MoE) for text-to-video, 14B MoE for image-to-video, and 5B parameter hybrid model supporting both modes.

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: AI-powered video generation for content creation, demonstrations, and prototyping
use_cases: Generate product demonstration videos from text descriptions
Create animated content from static images
Produce concept videos for client presentations
Generate video variations with different lighting and camera angles
Create motion graphics for marketing materials

key_features.lighting_control: Built-in lighting variations without additional LoRA
key_features.camera_angles: Native camera angle control and movement

strengths: No additional LoRA required for lighting/camera control
Multiple model sizes for different hardware capabilities
Integrated into ComfyUI with official support
Superior physics and motion quality vs predecessors
limitations: Slower generation times for 14B models (6-10 minutes)
Different VAE requirements for different model types (2.1 VAE for 14B, 2.2 VAE for 5B)
Two-stage sampling required for 14B MoE models
Model files are large (10-60GB storage needed)
480p resolution can be pixelated for detailed work
Requires technical setup knowledge for ComfyUI
